TopicTitle: Is it just me or who else wants KSP models that are made by like squad?

Articles.Content: I really wish that were actually models for KSP or KSP2 have if a model of Jeb or valentine beside a rocket from KSP1 or 2 that would be awesome or a model of the kerbol system or a rover with bob and bill on it there’s just so many possibilities for model sets or dioramas I don’t know tell me what you think and if you agree or disagree with me it’s up to you?

There were 3D prints available a whie ago, but don't think they still are.

Bit of a 'niche' market, unfortunately, for it to be mainstream though.

35 minutes ago, pandaman said:

There were 3D prints available a whie ago, but don't think they still are.

Bit of a 'niche' market, unfortunately, for it to be mainstream though.

If I am reading you correctly, you are talking of Eucl3d correct? Sadly if memory serves they shuttered several years ago. I was fortunate to be able to buy 3 3D prints from them, 2 of which were of my own design printed to the same exact scale. The other is a smaller little rocket with Jeb riding it rodeo style, designed by a player but I have 0 clue who. If I remember this evening I will check my imgur for pics of the prints or just upload pics. 
 

All of that said, I would absolutely love to get more if ever a chance comes.

091406232020

speaking of ksp merch, does anyone know how/where you buy the Jeb plushie?

Edited June 23, 2020 by Jurassic kerbal
Mistake

Yes Eucl3d, thats the ones.

A friend got me one of the 'Stargazer' models (Jeb sitting on his helmet gazing skywards) as a gift once.

I don't know how, but it is possible to extract the craft file and convert to STL for 3D printing.  I believe that's how Eucl3d did it for customers own ships.
